system.prerequisites:
The Void's Touch
OW: Psy Rating 5
system.sustained: Psyker Creates and fires a cold energy bolt, and one more per 2 Degrees of Success on their Focus power Test, up to a maximum number equal to their Psy Rating. These bolts hit a target automatically (although can be dodged), or anyone else within Psy Rating Metres of the main target. Each bolt does 1d10 + Psy Rating damage with Pen 4, +1 Penetration per Fatigue the target currently has. If anyone hit by these bolts takes damage after armour and toughness, they make a +0 Toughness Test or gain one fatigue.
